request.description:
This API to be used by BDA to create an user with appropriate details.

Possible vlaues

- role: ROLE_SCREEN_HANDLER, ROLE_CAMPAIGNER, ROLE_BDA, ROLE_ADMIN

response.name: Success
Error: already exists
Error : Bank account already exists
Error: invalid verification Id
Error : Invalid IFSC code
Error : Invalid Verified State
Success: With Bank verification id

request.description:
This API is used to list users. Functionalities

- Can search by
    
    - partial phone no
        
    - full email id
        
    - partial name
        

**Note:** The output list excludes the user requesting.

WIP

- role base access. Only Admin or bda users should have access to this API

response.name: Success
New Request

request.description:
This API is used to create BDA User from provided excel sheet

WIP

- cell level validations on phone email or other regex
- Phone no is not getting saved properly
    

**This API is still being fine tuned and is advised not to be used.**

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
    "statusCode": 200,
    "message": "BDA User %s signed up successfully",
    "responseBody": {
        "userIds": [
            "UR20250413fdrtkARqR2",
            "UR20250413fXUR246spL",
            "UR2025041368BfQs3rlK",
            "UR20250413G2cLWnDWZX",
            "UR20250413SFdm07alcj"
        ],
        "errorCases": [
            "[13,6] :: pincode should not be empty",
            "[6,8] :: ifsc code should not be empty",
            "[8,7] :: account no should not be empty",
            "[13,7] :: account no should not be empty",
            "[12,2] :: Email should not be empty",
            "[12,0] :: name should not be empty",
            "[12,1] :: phone no should not be empty",
            "[13,1] :: phone no should not be empty",
            "[9,3] :: AddressLine1 should not be empty",
            "[13,0] :: name should not be empty",
            "[13,5] :: state should not be empty",
            "[11,4] :: city should not be empty",
            "[13,8] :: ifsc code should not be empty",
            "[10,6] :: pincode should not be empty",
            "[13,4] :: city should not be empty"
        ]
    }
}

request.description: This API is used to get auth token to be used in subsequent API calls.

response.name: Mandatory Missing
Invalid Password
Success

request.description:
This API is used to update the below details

- name
- phone no
- email
- password
    

**Note:** The purpose of the API is to update details if provided. So, if the details are same as earlier than the same will be thrown as an exception. This is not true for password update.

response.name: Error: No Changes
Success: Name udpated
Error: Same Phone No
Error: Invalid phone No
Success: update password

request.description: This API is used by logged in user to update it's bank details.

response.name: Error: Mandatory Details missing
Error: Bank Details Exists
Error: Verification Id mandatory
Error: User trying to update others bank details
Success
Error: Trying to save verified false bank details
Success
Error: Business Details are associated to other user
Error: Business Id is mandatory
Success
response.body:
{
    "statusCode": 200,
    "message": "The address has been updated successfully",
    "responseBody": {
        "id": "AD20250419TOQrgoJ7pO",
        "addressLine1": "Maa Ambe temple near Patna Juction",
        "addressLine2": null,
        "city": "Bhawanipatna",
        "state": "Odisha",
        "pincode": "811308",
        "latitude": 1,
        "longitude": 1
    }
}

response.name: Error: Address Details are associated to other user
Error: Address Id is mandatory

request.description:
This API is used to mark an bank details as verified by the logged in user. Now, the logged in user can be of any role. The verificationId generated here should be used in the add or update bank details API

**WIP**

- This API should be accessible to BDA user. This will be picked up once the Role based access ticket is picked up

response.name: success
Error: Mandatory details missing
Success: verified false
